name: Legendary Dragon 2016 - Flying Raptor Strike Military Commando, Iron Tanks n Gunship Choppers
name_original: Legendary Dragon 2016 - Flying Raptor Strike Military Commando, Iron Tanks n Gunship Choppers
description:
Become the ultimate dragon lord in this real dinosaur era battle game with gunship helicopter and iron tanks. Play as a Warrior dragon in an action packed military combat simulator. Defend your dragon clan and little hatchlings. Unleash the ferocious beast at the battle field of army helicopter 3d, knight and dragon slayers.

Fantasy meets virtual reality in this epic Legendary Dragon 2016 game.
Be the Legendary warrior…. fight the military squad, gunship helicopters and mark this battlefield as your throne. Destroy the army basecamp to claim back what was yours!! Ready to train your dragon for war combat in this latest tank battle and flying reptile simulation.

Highlights
- Real flying dinosaur models
- Variety of Warrior Dragons to unlock
- Stunning 3D Medieval military basecamp
- Smooth controls And Amazing Visual Effects
- Epic Battles With tank iron vassals and gunship helicopters
- Realistic Fire Breathing Action
